comment: /**  * Initializes the adapter  *  * @param camelContext the CamelContext  */
code: /**  * Initializes the adapter  *  * @param camelContext the CamelContext  */ void init(CamelContext camelContext).

comment: /**  * Attempt to read/convert the message body into a {@link Map} type  *  * @param body the message body  * @param exchange the Camel exchange  * @return converted as {@link Map} or <tt>null</tt> if not possible  */
code: /**  * Attempt to read/convert the message body into a {@link Map} type  *  * @param body the message body  * @param exchange the Camel exchange  * @return converted as {@link Map} or <tt>null</tt> if not possible  */ Map readValue(Object body, Exchange exchange).

comment: /**  * Attempts to write the value as a JSOn {@link String} value.  *  * @param value  the value  * @param exchange the Camel exchange  * @return written as {@link String} JSon or <tt>null</tt> if not possible  */
code: /**  * Attempts to write the value as a JSOn {@link String} value.  *  * @param value  the value  * @param exchange the Camel exchange  * @return written as {@link String} JSon or <tt>null</tt> if not possible  */ String writeAsString(Object value, Exchange exchange).
